summary: I CAN FEEL SLACK PLAY IN THE UPPER STEERING THAT MAKE A KNOCKING SOUND WHEN TURNING THE STEERING WHEEL LEFT OR RIGHT WHEN STATIONARY, MOVING, IN TOWN OR ON THE HIGHWAY. ALSO ON INTERSTATE WHEN I REACH APPROXIMATELY 60 MPH A VIBRATION IN THE FRONT END STARTS AND INCREASES WITH SPEED. IT GETS TO AN INTENSITY THAT I DONT FEEL SAFE DRIVING OVER SIXTYFIVE MPH
